result.eng: Put those things in order according to size.
result.ga: cuir na rudaí sin in ord de réir méide
result.orig: cuir na rudaí sin in ord de réir méide
result.html: cuir na rudaí sin in ord de réir méidePut those things in order according to size.
result.ponchtml: cuir na rudaí sin in ord de réir méidePut those things in order according to size.

result.html: cén mhéid atá ionat anoisWhat size are you now?
result.ponchtml: cén ṁéid atá ionat anoisWhat size are you now?

result.ga: tá siad ar aon mhéid
result.orig: tá siad ar aon mhéid
result.html: tá siad ar aon mhéidThey are the same size.
result.ponchtml: tá siad ar aon ṁéidThey are the same size.

result.eng: Jamie was left among a pack of other children who were about his own size.
result.ga: fágadh séimí i gcuideachta scaifte eile páistí a bhí fána thuairim féin méide
